data.description:
Rescue penguins by solving lemmings-style puzzles. Made for Gear VR! 

The Penguins are trapped and they need your help. Guide them to the Rescue Ship by opening doors and moving blocks. Help them waddle around traps and escape patrolling Guards. Save the penguins quickly and collect all 3 eggs for maximum points!

*Rescue adorable Penguins & Save their Eggs*
Help your penguins waddle out of danger to reach the Rescue Ship.

*Discover an Enchanted Frozen World*
Immerse yourself in a vivid, colorful arctic world. Hum along with the catchy soundtrack. 

*Easy to play. Fun to Master.*
Beat tricky levels using simple tricks. No controller required.

*Explore dozens of exciting puzzles.*
Over 30 levels to master. Collect all 3 eggs and get faster times to earn higher scores.

*Simply Addictive. Only on Gear VR.*

changelog.change_log:
Major Art Update

Sunset Setting: Enjoy the sunset while the waves roll in.
Aurora Australis: Gaze up at the moonlight and watch the colours dance through the sky. 
New Friends: Orca families, seagulls and a mysterious new friend may show up in any level. 
New Song: A catchy new beat to add more variety as you play.
Daytime Sky Improvement: Beautiful clouds and dazzling new colours. 

All the upgrades are available throughout the entire 40 levels, so go ahead and replay past levels for an all new experience!

* More Levels: Enjoy 40 Fun Puzzles!
* More Story: New story comic introducing the Robots. Find in the "Enter the Guards" level.
* Better Graphics: Improved Appearance for a more vivid VR experience.  
* New Settings Menu: Reset your Orientation and Mute the music everywhere for a more enjoyable experience. You can also view the Credits!
* Bug Fixes and Improvements: Enjoy a smooth, high quality game play experience.
